name: Solitaire Tripeaks: Classic
description:
Enjoy the best Solitaire TriPeaks for free, the classic solitaire card game which allows you to train your brain with different solitaire puzzles.

Do you play Classic Solitaire, Pyramid, Freecell, logic puzzle or Spider Solitaire? Try Solitaire TriPeaks! Solitaire fans and card games fans will love the free games of TriPeaks Solitaire(also known as Tri Towers, Triple Peaks or Three Peaks)!

Solitaire TriPeaks HIGHLIGHTS:
* Great graphics and amazing beautiful themes.
* 1,000+ challenging levels, with more in later version!
* Relaxing to play and help chill you out
* Win free bonus as you solve every puzzle.

Solitaire TriPeaks FEATURES:
* 20,000 Welcome bonus and Massive Free coins every hour!
* Fill up your Streak Meter to win free BONUSES and WILD cards!
* No time limits, no pressure.
* Tri-peaks Solitaire in your hands, anytime, anywhere.

Never played Solitaire or any card games before? No worries. TriPeaks Solitaire is Easy to play! Simply complete a quick tutorial and you'll learn how to play! It's a casual, entertaining free card game for everyone to enjoy! What are you waiting for?

If this sounds like exactly the solitaire game you were looking for — DOWNLOAD NOW on App Store now for FREE! You won’t be disappointed!
developers: Word Puzzle & Fun Games For Free
